::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Gotron as the bot bows. It was annoying when bots 
reacted to him like that, but he guessed it was only natural.

"As you know, the Alliance just got back from a battle with the 
Maximals," Zardus begins, tapping a few keys to show the last view of 
the Cybertronian Fire that FZ had. It was fairly devestated, "This is 
what we did to their base. Now, the situation on the planet is soon 
going to possibly heat up incredibly, and I want the Maximals to be 
ready to fight alongside us if needed."

A small smile crept onto his lips. Manipulating factions to do things 
was an artform. "Do you think you can go to the Maximals and try to 
establish good relations with them? It will be possibly dangerous, and 
you'll have the Iron Fist's fastest craft with you in case you need to 
escape."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Gotron hurries to Zardus' position, bowing before him.
> 
> Gotron: Yes, Lord Zardus, what do you want me
